case_title: JAHANGIR KHAN AND 2 OTHERS vs THE STATE
judges: Raja Saleem Akhtar, Additional Chief Land Commissioner Punjab

grounds_for_rejection: No affidavit filed by petitioners Nos. 2 and 3 showing willingness for exchange
Claim by Major Nazar Hussain Khan regarding purchase of land for Rs. 2,72,000

legal_arguments.natural_justice: Principle of natural justice violated due to lack of notice and hearing for petitioners Nos. 2 and 3
legal_arguments.affidavit_omission: Considered an irregularity, not substantive violation of law

decision.case_remanded: For fresh decision after hearing the parties
reasoning: Failure to serve notice to petitioners Nos. 2 and 3
